main event: On May 6, 1957, at Edwards AFB, California, a black circular object approximately 30 feet in diameter was observed flying at 6,000 feet altitude, making a 90-degree turn and accelerating out of sight.
interesting points: The object was described as under intelligent control,The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes,No sound was heard during the observation,No condensation trail was left by the object,Several military and civilian personnel observed the object.
witness description: Lt. Col. Walter G. Winstead and other military personnel
